short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for improving amazon search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon defaults to sorting by "featured" when searching for items. When "Best Selling" is selected as the sort criteria, items are not sorted in descending order by the number of reviews. This app changes the default behavior to sort by "Best Selling" when searching for items and sorts them in order of review count. This extension is currently in beta.
